summary: This is Martellus, Vampire Lord of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
The following Mods are needed if you want all the items, Powers and Followers to work:
Dawnguard DLC
Winter Is Coming Cloaks
Bandolier Bags and Pouches
Better Vampires
UFO- Ultimate Follower Overhaul
My Home is Your Home
Convenient Crossbows ( If you want to be able to make crossbows at any forge).

You can find most of my followers in Volkihar Castle (The Vampire Castle in Dawnguard).

Installation
------------
Just drop Save 28 - Martellus  Riverwood Trader  16.57.07.ess file into your Skyrim Saves folder
C:\\\\\\\\Users\\\\\\\\YourName\\\\\\\\Documents\\\\\\\\My Games\\\\\\\\skyrim\\\\\\\\saves <---- Location should look something like that
author: Rmyco98
